40055000.English_Text: (How did the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon tribe</> get to the sea and moon continent?)
40055000.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>洪顿人</>是怎么到海狼大陆的?)

40055001.Chinese_Text: (不要被<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>曼荼罗</>中的狐尾所迷惑)

40055003.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>이 관리를 해 되려 짐승이 많아졌군. 다른 곳은 어떨까?)
40055003.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>is managed to increase the number of animals. How about other places?)
40055003.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>照顾,所以动物比较多.其他地方呢?)

40055004.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>원정대</>가 토지를 제공했다면 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>홍돈족</>도 약탈을 일삼지 않았을 거야)
40055004.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>If the expedition</> provided the land, the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Reddon</> would also loot. I wouldn't have taken it)
40055004.Chinese_Text: (如果<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>探险队</>提供了土地,<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>洪顿</>也不会掠夺)

40055005.English_Text: (The crowd. You need to know the purpose of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blackdawn</>)
40055005.Chinese_Text: (人群是这样的.我们要知道<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色黎明</>的目的)

40055006.English_Text: (They are keeping the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> in check. Seems serious...)
40055006.Chinese_Text: (他们正在控制<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>.看起来很严重......)

40055007.English_Text: (If you follow <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Sura</>, then <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Your Shinsu</> <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> cannot be tolerated)
40055007.Chinese_Text: (如果你跟随<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Sura</>,你将无法忍受<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>崇拜<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Shinsu</>的风白门</>)

40055008.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The scorpion</> caught my eye. I'll have to look into it)

40055009.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scorpions</> and <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Mushrooms</> also breathe poison. That's dangerous. )

40055010.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Animals</>they're trying to protect the tree from people)
40055010.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]> 精灵 </> 试图保护树免受人的伤害)

40055011.English_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>The field</> has <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>You're Dark</>. Why aren't there people around? ?)

40055012.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>어둑시니</>가 수수께끼로 장난 치니 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>수수께끼 벌판</>이라 하게 된 거군)
40055012.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Dim</> playing with riddles <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Planes of riddles</> giant)

40055013.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Fox</>so it's strange that <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Lumberjack</> in a dangerous place. Let's investigate further. )
40055013.Chinese_Text: (奇怪的是<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>因为<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>狐狸</>在危险的地方伐木</>.让我们进一步调查)

40055014.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>여우</>는 사람이 떠나고 자리를 잡았어. 이곳은 왜 버려졌을까?)
40055014.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Fox</> has taken a seat. Why is this place abandoned?)
40055014.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Fox</>离开定居.为什么这个地方被废弃了?)

40055015.English_Text: (The <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Lumberjack</> was abandoned because of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>mandala</> cut from the tree)
40055015.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>伐木场</>因砍伐树木产生<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>曼荼罗</>而废弃.)

40055017.Original_Text: (숲의 그늘에서 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>어둑시니</>가 생겼어. 그럼 숲이 생겨난 이유는?)
40055017.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>You are dim</> in the shade of the forest. So why did the forest exist?)
40055017.Chinese_Text: (在森林的阴凉处,造就了<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑暗</>.那森林为什么会存在呢?)

40055018.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>서인족</>은 뭔가에 침식됐어. 죽은 나무만 있는 게 의심스럽군)
40055018.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Westin</> has been eroded by something. I doubt there are only dead trees)
40055018.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>西方人</>被什么东西侵蚀了.我怀疑只有死树.)

40055019.Original_Text: (생명력을 잃은 숲, 이성을 잃은 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>서인족</> 모두 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>탁회암</> 탓이군)
40055019.English_Text: (Forest lost vitality, lost reason <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Seoin</> all <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Tarkite</> It's your fault)
40055019.Chinese_Text: (失去活力的森林,<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>失去理智的瑞恩人</>所有<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Takhoeam</>都是罪魁祸首)

40055020.English_Text: (The catastrophe happened and only <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Tiger</> are left...)

40055021.English_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>No Greater Rift</>, but <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burnhead</>. Why are they flocking here? is what?)
40055021.Chinese_Text: (没有<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>大裂谷</>,而是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>一燃烧</>.他们为什么蜂拥而至?)

40055022.English_Text: (Isn't <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burned</> not able to move because it is blocked by forest?)
40055022.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]> </> 被森林挡住了就不能动了?)

40055023.English_Text: (Probably the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>fertile land</> forest part was created to prevent <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>burnout</> maybe?)
40055023.Chinese_Text: (也许<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>肥沃的大地</>森林是为了防止<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>倦怠</>?)

40055024.Original_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거대 비옥</>이 있는데 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>이 손놓고 있는 게 이상해. 조사해보자)
40055024.English_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>great fertility</>, it's strange that <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>weeping</> is letting go. Investigation Let's do it)
40055024.Chinese_Text: (有<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>巨大的生育</>,但奇怪的是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>培养</>被抛在了后面.我们来调查一下)

40055025.English_Text: (Is it because I saw the old disaster and knew the horror of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>fertility</>?)
40055025.Chinese_Text: (是不是因为看到了旧祸,知道了<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>生育</>的恐惧?)

40055026.English_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Under excavation</> <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burnout</> lair <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Have you given up on fertility</>?)
40055026.Chinese_Text: (你是不是因为挖掘点</>下有<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>的巢穴而放弃<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>生育</>?)

40055027.Original_Text: (이곳 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>사슴</>들의 뿔이 눈에 띄는군. 좀 더 조사해볼까?)
40055027.English_Text: (The horns of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>deer</> here stand out. Should I investigate further?)
40055027.Chinese_Text: (这里的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>鹿和</>的角很突出.我们要进一步调查吗?)

40055028.Original_Text: (악영향으로 생긴 건 아닌듯 하군. 홀릴 것 같은 붉은 빛이야)
40055028.English_Text: (I don't think it was caused by a bad influence. It's a red light that's captivating)
40055028.Chinese_Text: (好像不是受什么不好的影响,是红光,让人心醉)

40055029.English_Text:
(Is there a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Flowers</> here too?
Are you aiming for horns?)
40055029.Chinese_Text:
(这里还有<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>战队</>?
他们的目标是角吗?)

40055030.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>해파리</>는 보통 바닷가에 있지 않나? 왜 여기에 있는 거지?)
40055030.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Jellyfish</> aren't usually at the beach? Why are they here?)
40055030.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>水母</>平时不在海边?为什么会在这里?)

40055031.Original_Text: (바라볼 수록 마음이 편안해져... 아차, 정신 차려야지)
40055031.English_Text: (The more I look at it, the more comfortable I feel... Oops, I need to calm down)
40055031.Chinese_Text: (越看越舒服……哎呀,我要冷静下来)

40055032.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>삼색조</>의 화려한 깃털은 숲의 환경을 따라 변화한 것 같아)
40055032.English_Text: (The colorful feathers of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Tricolor</> seem to have changed with the forest environment)
40055032.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>三色</>的五彩羽毛好像随着森林的环境发生了变化)

40055033.English_Text: (That pickaxe...? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Where there is no fertility</><textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The miner</> Why are they there?)

40055034.Original_Text: (설마 이 많은 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>광부</>들이 바위산을 뚫고 있었던 걸까?)
40055034.English_Text: (Maybe all these <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>miners</> were digging through the rocky mountain?)
40055034.Chinese_Text: (难不成这么多<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>矿工</>在石山上挖?)

40055035.English_Text: (The mutation that swept the area must have been a disaster. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Even the mutant</>mutated...)
40055035.Chinese_Text: (席卷该地区的异变肯定是一场灾难.即使是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Parbali</>异变……)

40055036.English_Text: (The aftermath of the mutation could not have been avoided by the administrators of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Exploration </>)
40055036.Chinese_Text: (异变的后果似乎连<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>探索队</>的管理者都无法避免)

40055037.English_Text: (The giant bugs might be worth investigating)

40055038.Original_Text: (이 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>유충</>들이 모두 자란 모습은 상상도 하고 싶지 않은걸)
40055038.English_Text: (I don't want to imagine seeing these <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>larvae</> all grown)
40055038.Chinese_Text: (我什至不想想象看到这些<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>幼虫和</>都长大了)

40055039.English_Text: (Due to the rugged terrain, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ginseng</> are concentrated at the foot of the mountain)
40055039.Chinese_Text: (由于地势崎岖,<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>大民町</>集中在山脚下)

40055040.Original_Text: (변이의 흔적이 눈에 띄는군. 무엇에 의한 영향이지?)
40055040.English_Text: (The signs of mutation are noticeable. What is the effect?)
40055040.Chinese_Text: (变异的迹象很明显.效果如何?)

40055041.English_Text: (The cause of the heterogeneous color is the shape from <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Termicite</>)

40055042.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>사묘정</>의 변이는 더디게 진행되고 있어. 완전 변이도 시간문제겠지만)
40055042.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Samyojeong</>'s mutation is progressing slowly. Full mutation will only be a matter of time)
40055042.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Samyojeong </>的变异进展缓慢.即使是完全变异也只是时间问题.)

40055043.English_Text: (You might as well take a break and examine <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Goat</>)

40055044.Original_Text: (거대한 바위 경사로 탓에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>산양</>만 살 수 있는 것 같아)
40055044.English_Text: (I think only <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Goat</> can live on this huge rocky ramp)
40055044.Chinese_Text: (因为巨大的石坡,好像只有<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>山羊</>能活)

40055045.Original_Text: (병사는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>용의 사체</> 진입로 확보를 위해 파견되었던 건가...)
40055045.English_Text: (Soldiers were sent to secure access to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Dragon Carcasses</>...)
40055045.Chinese_Text: (被派去保卫通路的士兵<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>是龙的尸体吗?)

40055046.Original_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거대 탁회암</> 근처의 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>청인족</>은 더 강할까? 조사해 보자)
40055046.English_Text: Is the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue People</> stronger near (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Giant Marbles</>? Let's investigate)
40055046.Chinese_Text: (附近的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蓝人</>强吗?我们调查一下.)

40055047.Original_Text: (다른 점은 보이지 않는군. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>탁회암</>이 영향은 주지 않나봐)
40055047.English_Text: (I don't see any difference. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Tarnish</>I don't think this has any effect)
40055047.Chinese_Text: (我看不出区别.<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Takhoeam</>似乎没有任何效果)

40055048.English_Text: (By the way, there are a lot of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue people</> around here)
40055048.Chinese_Text: (顺便说一下,周围有很多<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蓝人</>聚集)

40055049.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue people</> were ordinary people before being changed by <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Takhoite</> I guess)
40055049.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蓝人</>在被<textColor=[255:204:102:255]> Takhoeam </>改变之前一定是普通人)

40055050.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>창도단</>이 주변을 배회하는 게 신경쓰여. 좀 더 조사해볼까?)
40055050.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spear gang</>I'm concerned about wandering around here. Shall we investigate further?)
40055050.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>担心枪族</>四处游荡.要不要再调查一下?)

40055052.English_Text:
(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]><textColor=[215]<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>base</> created by expedition</>
<textColor=[215 :94:94:255]>The spear gang</> took over)

40055053.English_Text: (With such a tight security, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum flower bed</> would be in trouble)
40055053.Chinese_Text: (只是因为安检太严,<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>梅花</>也会有麻烦)

40055054.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>거미</> 수가 대단해. 기이할정도로 모여있는데 조사 해볼까?)
40055054.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The number of spiders</> is amazing. It's a bizarre group. Shall we check it out?)
40055054.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蜘蛛</>的数量惊人.奇怪的聚集,我们要调查吗?)

40055055.English_Text: (There were a lot of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spiders</> because people didn't reach them)
40055055.Chinese_Text: (因为人够不到所以有很多<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蜘蛛</>)
